oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bell family
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: The Lindsey Art Gallery, 108 Gay Street, Knoxville, TN.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: George Bell (brother of John Bell) and wife Malinda Jane Hinton Bell. Taken by The Lindsey Art Gallery, 108 Gay Street, Knoxville, TN. She appears to be wearing a veil and holding a fan; possibly a wedding portrait.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Fans;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
